entry.string: A successful Paypal IPN event has been recognized, below is a transaction of the event
entry.translation: Se ha reconocido un evento exitoso de IPN de Paypal, abajo está la transacción del evento

entry.string: A failed Paypal IPN event has been recognized, below is a transaction of the event
entry.translation: Se ha reconocido un evento fallido de IPN de Paypal, abajo está la transacción del evento
